survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Electric Scooter Sharing Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate customer satisfaction and identify areas for improvement in electric scooter sharing services.

questions.question_text: How often do you use electric scooter sharing services?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice question to ensure clarity. Ensure mobile-friendly display.

script.question_text: How often do you use electric scooter sharing services?

questions.question_text: What factors influence your choice of electric scooter sharing service? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice question. Ensure options are clearly visible on mobile devices.

script.question_text: What factors influence your choice of electric scooter sharing service? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the pricing of the electric scooter sharing service?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction measurement. Ensure readability.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the pricing of the electric scooter sharing service?

questions.question_text: What improvements would enhance your experience with electric scooter sharing services?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Ensure sufficient space for text input.

script.question_text: What improvements would enhance your experience with electric scooter sharing services?

questions.question_text: Have you ever experienced safety concerns while using electric scooter sharing services?
questions.client_notes: Binary question for quick response. Ensure straightforward wording.
